players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Does anyone have any suspicions or information about who might be the mafioso? We need to work together carefully since one of us is already gone."
Charlie: "Alice is the mafioso. We have to vote to arrest her now before she kills again."
Bob: "I think it's too soon to be sure Alice is the mafioso without more evidence. Charlie, can you explain why you suspect Alice so strongly?"
Charlie: "Alice was confirmed as the mafioso by my investigation last night. We can't afford to hesitate; voting her out now is the only way to protect the town."
